hopobject.name: hardhat
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US) AppleWebKit/534.3 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/6.0.473.0 Safari/534.3
hopobject.body:
The BeagleBoard Hardhat is an industrial analog and digital I/O expansion board for the Beagle board. Features 4-20mA transmitters and inputs, 0-10V outputs and inputs, along with RS485 and a set of dry contactors.
The Hardhat is an Open Source Hardware project.
hopobject.shortdesc: The BeagleBoard Hardhat is an industrial analog and digital I/O expansion board.
